SQL.LOAD: SELECT company_credit_card_id, billing_date, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, cc_billing_schedule_id FROM elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule WHERE cc_billing_schedule_id = :cc_billing_schedule_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT ccc.CC_BILLING_SCHEDULE_ID, ccb.company_id, ccb.BILLING_DATE, ccc.created_by FROM elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule ccb , elp_company_credit_Card ccc WHERE company_id = :closing_year and ccb.company_credit_Card_id = ccc.company_credit_Card_id_id and substr(to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4) = (select max(substr(to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4)) BILLING_DATE from elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule ccb , elp_company_credit_Card ccc where ccc.company_credit_Card_id = :closing_year and ccb.company_credit_Card_id = ccc.company_credit_Card_id)
SQL.GET_BILLING_YEARS: select distinct substr(to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4) Id, substr(to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4) Description FROM elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule ccb , elp_company_credit_Card ccc where ccc.company_credit_Card_id = :company_credit_card_Id and ccb.company_credit_Card_id = ccc.company_credit_Card_id and substr(to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4) <= to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') order by Description
SQL.GET_ALL_THE_BILLING_YEARS: select distinct substr(to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4) Id, substr(to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4) Description FROM elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule ccb , elp_company_credit_Card ccc where ccc.company_credit_Card_id = :company_credit_card_Id and ccb.company_credit_Card_id = ccc.company_credit_Card_id order by Description
SQL.GET_ALL_THE_BILLING_YEARS_BY_USER: select distinct substr(to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4) Id, substr(to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4) Description from ELITA.elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule WHERE COMPANY_ID IN (SELECT COMPANY_ID FROM ELITA.ELP_USER_COMPANY WHERE USER_ID = :USER_ID) order by Description desc
SQL.GET_BILLING_DATE: Select * from ( select CC_BILLING_SCHEDULE_ID, ccb.BILLING_DATE FROM elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule ccb , elp_company_credit_Card ccc where ccc.company_credit_Card_id = :company_credit_card_Id and ccb.company_credit_Card_id = ccc.company_credit_Card_id and ccb.BILLING_DATE < :FOR_THIS_DATE order by ccb.BILLING_DATE desc ) WHERE ROWNUM =1
SQL.GET_MIN_BILLING_DATE: select min(ccb.BILLING_DATE) BILLING_DATE FROM elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule ccb , elp_company_credit_Card ccc where ccc.company_credit_Card_id = :company_credit_card_Id and ccb.company_credit_Card_id = ccc.company_credit_Card_id
SQL.GET_ALL_BILLING_DATES: select CC_BILLING_SCHEDULE_ID ID, COMPANY_CREDIT_CARD_ID to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') code, to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') description from FROM elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule ccb , elp_company_credit_Card ccc where ccc.company_credit_Card_id = :company_credit_card_Id and ccb.company_credit_Card_id = ccc.company_credit_Card_id and trunc(ccb.BILLING_DATE) < trunc(SYSDATE) order by ccb.BILLING_DATE desc
SQL.GET_BILLING_DATES: select CC_BILLING_SCHEDULE_ID, to_char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'DD-Mon-YYYY') Description from elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule ccb , elp_company_credit_Card ccc where ccc.company_credit_Card_id = :company_credit_card_Id and ccb.COMPANY_CREDIT_CARD_ID = ccc.company_credit_Card_id and substr(to_Char(ccb.BILLING_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),1,4) = :closing_year order by ccb.BILLING_DATE
SQL.GET_LAST_BILLING_DATES: select max(ccb.BILLING_DATE) Description from elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule ccb , elp_company_credit_Card ccc where ccc.company_credit_Card_id = :company_credit_card_Id and ccb.COMPANY_CREDIT_CARD_ID = ccc.company_credit_Card_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule SET company_credit_card_id = :company_credit_card_id, billing_date = :billing_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE cc_billing_schedule_id = :cc_billing_schedule_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elita.elp_cc_billing_schedule ( company_credit_card_id, billing_date, created_by, cc_billing_schedule_id ) VALUES ( :company_credit_card_id, :billing_date, :created_by, :cc_billing_schedule_id )
